entries.title: Want to build a website? Just ask ChatGPT in plain english
entries.description: YouTube and TikTok are already rife with videos of people showing how they’ve found ways to have ChatGPT perform tasks that once required a hefty dose of coding ability.

entries.title: Crypto hacks stole record $3.8 billion in 2022, led by North Korea groups
entries.description: Last year was the worst on record for cryptocurrency heists, with hackers stealing as much as $3.8 billion, led by attackers linked to North Korea who netted more than ever before, a U.S.-based blockchain analytics firm said in a report on Wednesday.
